## SyncTapHook.tap() method

listen to hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tap(fn: ISyncTapCallback<T, R>, bucket?: IHookBucketType): ITapDestroy;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>ISyncTapCallback&lt;T, R&gt;</code> | Listener callback |
|  bucket | <code>IHookBucketType</code> | Listen to specified hashcode bucket |

`ITapDestroy`

The unTap function
